title: LOVE YOURSELF 轉 'TEAR'
short_description: BTS releases third studio album LOVE YOURSELF 轉 «TEAR»
Fake love inevitably leads to loss and separation,
For true love can only begin when you learn to love yourself
description: BTS will release LOVE YOURSELF 轉 ‘TEAR’, their third studio album on May 18.

BTS’ LOVE YOURSELF series bears the message that loving oneself is the beginning of true love. Whereas the previously unveiled LOVE YOURSELF 起 ‘WONDER’ and LOVE YOURSELF 承 ‘HER’ albums expressed the heart-fluttering and tingling moments of love, LOVE YOUR  SELF 轉 ‘TEAR’ album embodies the pain of boys faced with parting.
